sentence.Network_en: The LCD will be much cheaper in the short run, I suppose.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想, 要不了多久液晶荧幕就更加便宜了.

sentence.Network_en: For short - run decisions, the ability to predict seasonal fluctuations is often essential.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于短时期的决策, 预测季节变动则是基本方法.

sentence.Network_en: For any practical short run, gold's value is anybody's guess.
sentence.Network_cn: 就短期的实际情况来说, 黄金价值却是任何人都吃不准的事情.
